网络. 业务；事务；商科

商业；商务；生意；买卖；交易；营业额；贸易额；营业状况；企业；商业机构；行业；职业；公事；事情；事务；职责；业务；表演；剧情动作；重要事情；要点；难题；棘手的事；私事；归（某人或某机构）管的事

sogou-gaokao.n: 生意; 事务[出现21次)];商业[出现6次)];企业[出现2次)];职责; 本分[出现1次)]

sogou-zhongkao.n: 商业; 生意[出现63次)];企业; 公司[出现29次)];职业; 事业; 行业[出现10次)];商务; 公事[出现4次)];责任; 职责[出现1次)]

1.en: I said angrily. ? 'It's none of your business, ' the young man said rudely.
1.cn: 我生气地说。“这不关你的事，”这个青年粗鲁地说。

2.en: This data is often stored for recording purposes, and may often be used with business intelligence tools to give some value.
2.cn: 存储这些数据通常是为了记录，但常常与企业智能化工具结合起来以提供某种价值。

3.en: But Prof Cabral will not be the last: a dozen faculty members from the Spanish business school will move there over the next few years.
3.cn: 但卡布拉尔教授不会是最后一位：未来几年内，这家西班牙商学院的许多教员都将迁驻到这里来。

0.en: You will hear some details from our business later.
0.cn: 稍等，您将听到我们公司商业上经营的细节。

1.en: I'm busy, too. I have a business offer deal that is...
1.cn: 我也有事，我有...商业上的项目，买卖，大买卖。

2.en: We are not getting a business loan! You tricked me into coming to the city.
2.cn: 我们不许借商业贷款，你把我骗来市里。

3.en: But what about your "class reunion" where everybody brings a "business offer"?
3.cn: 那你那个需要带着商业项目参加的豪华同学聚会怎么办？

4.en: Really? Sexism in business? So what did you do for work, Ben, before you retired?
4.cn: 是吗？商业中的性别歧视吗？所以你退休之前是做什么工作的？

5.en: Yeah, we'll just go in and while we're in here, well, I don't know, ask for a business loan.
5.cn: 我们就转一圈，不过既然都来了，要不就问问商业贷款吧。

6.en: Why, because of this totally out-of-the-blue order we got to do cupcakes for this business seminar?
6.cn: 为什么，是因为我们突然接到这商业座谈会的小蛋糕订单吗？

7.en: Being invited to give a business speech at this club hit me even more egregious because you couldn't claim that it was only social business that was done there.
7.cn: 被邀请到这家俱乐部做商业演讲就更让人不爽了因为这根本就不是单纯的社交活动场所。

8.en: From Hong Kong Island's central business district, take the half hour bus ride to the tranquil beaches of Shek O.
8.cn: 由香港岛的中心商业区，乘坐巴士到清静的石澳海滩只需半小时。

9.en: And also 'cause they're Jewish. I'm the one with the business degree, and you have to trust me on this.
9.cn: 而且也因为他们都是犹太人。我才是有商业学位的人，这事你得相信我。

10.en: Explore the malls and futuristic architecture of Hong Kong's main business district, Central.
10.cn: 在香港的主要商业区中环，您可以游走各大大小小的商场和富有未来感的建筑物。

11.en: Whoever threw that is not afraid to really go for it, and that will go a long way toward success in business.
11.cn: 扔球过来的那个人从心所愿，放胆去做能在商业道路上获得更长远的成功。

12.en: Raymond's not a politician. He relies on our political expertise as much as we rely on his business acumen.
12.cn: Raymond不是政客。他依赖我们的政治意见，正如我们依靠他的商业头脑。

13.en: And then one day she cornered the man who was installing the telephone here and that's how I got my first job in business.
13.cn: 然后有一天，她堵住来这里装电话的人，我就是那样得到了第一份商业工作。

14.en: You know what? You're right. You're the business genius. What do I know? Let's go get that loan. Thank you!
14.cn: 其实呢，你说得有道理，你才是商业天才，我懂个屁啊，咱们进去贷款吧。谢谢支持！

15.en: This modern business district, filled with light and art, is testimony that Paris is designed for living, even when at work.
15.cn: 这个现代化的商业区充满了光明与艺术气息，证明巴黎人即使在工作中也不忘享受生活。

16.en: This is a business intervention. It's not an intervention. Max, your behavior lately has affected me in the following ways.
16.cn: 原来这是商业批斗会啊。这不是批斗会好吗，麦克斯，你最近的行为由以下几种方式影响了我。

17.en: It appears Decima Technology has been dismantled as a viable business entity, which makes me wonder, who exactly is getting the NSA feeds?
17.cn: 似乎德西玛科技已经解散不再是商业实体了，这让我很想知道，国安局的监控信号到底发给谁了？

18.en: Just a few months ago this year, a very well respected and well-known business executives in Silicon Valley, invited me to give a speech to his club on social media.
18.cn: 今年，就在几个月前，硅谷一位很受尊敬的知名商业经理人邀请我到他的社交媒体俱乐部发表演讲。

19.en: I just need one page. Which page can we use? News, sports, fashion. Not the fashion page. OK, I'll use the business page.
19.cn: 我只需要一张纸。哪页是我们不要的？新闻版，体育版，噢对了，时尚版。不要用我的时尚版。好吧，那我们就用商业版。
